about_the_game:
• The atmosphere of the game

Enter the world of AWAKE and experience an environment full of mystery and horror. Fight with mutants and zombies and find a way to escape with guns, bullets and blood. Those who have left the AWAKE world alive are less than the number of fingers, that is where it all ends. A moment without a weapon in the AWAKE means death. Passing through narrow and dark tunnels and the song of zombies, which smells of death, eats away at the human soul.
You have to pass through poisonous gases. Fight with intelligent space robots that have come to earth and save humanity. You have to cross the dragon's territory to save


  • ENEMIES

zombie
Shooter zombies
Flying and fire-throwing dragons
Various monsters that crawl on two legs or four arms
Rats and big spiders
Alien robots with laser weapons
Flying robots with cannons and laser weapons
Meat trees with toxic gases


  • Game mechanics

In this game, you see blood splattering around with every shot. You use different weapons to kill enemies. You can destroy enemies in groups by throwing grenades and shooting barrels and explosive gas capsules.
Break wooden crates and loot chests and backpacks to collect ammo and health packs




  • Summary of the story of the game

The world has been destroyed by war and governments have fallen. Most of the regions of the earth have been contaminated with deadly gases, nuclear radiation and unknown diseases. People call these regions the awakening region. That is, the place where you must always be awake because if you sleep, you will not wake up again. You enter the game in the role of Yusuf, who is a former employee of the rescue forces. During the chaos a year ago, he lost his wife and child in one of the safe areas, and now a request for help from the awakening area brings him there, because he thinks that this help message was sent by his wife

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
